entry.title: Username
entry.para: Enter your username here (if it is not already prefilled). Not all installations support this.

entry.title: Old password
entry.para: Enter your current, working login password here. You must correctly enter your current login password, or you cannot change your password.

entry.title: New password
entry.para: Enter the new password, that is what you want to change your password to. Note that the password entered must meet some minimum standards (at least 8 characters length, not match your username, have a combination of letters and other characters, etc) or you will get an error.

entry.title: Confirm new password
entry.para: Enter the new password a second time in the Confirm New Password area. This is to make sure you don't make a typo or other mistake and lock you out of your account.

entry.title: Change password on
entry.para: Select the server or application in which you want to change the password. Not all installations support this.
